name: WBWWB Clone
description:
This is my first Unity project, so expect it to be pretty bad. It's a clone of We Become What We Behold by Nicky Case (https://ncase.itch.io/wbwwb) that I plan to take in a new direction. I hope to end up with a game more like Don't Touch Anything where there are multiple paths and endings. The game is nowhere close to finished yet so expect changes!

Feedback is appreciated.
